agriculture.title: Integrated Cold Chain Network
agriculture.summary: Temperature-controlled collection, storage, and logistics network for fruits and vegetables.
agriculture.overview: A farm-to-port cold-chain backbone that reduces post-harvest losses and increases export-grade consistency.

agriculture.title: Value-Added Spice Processing Park
agriculture.summary: Processing and export hub for premium spices and extracts.
agriculture.overview: Integrated grading, extraction, packaging, and traceability systems for high-value spice exports.

tourism.title: Eco-Lodge Cluster Development
tourism.summary: Low-impact eco-lodges linked to community tourism experiences.
tourism.overview: A sustainability-driven resort cluster with curated activities and local enterprise participation.

tourism.title: Ayurveda Wellness Resort
tourism.summary: International-standard wellness retreat with Ayurveda and rehabilitation programs.
tourism.overview: An integrated wellness destination combining hospitality, medical diagnostics, and preventive care services.

urban.title: Colombo Mixed-Use Waterfront Block
urban.summary: Integrated commercial, residential, and public realm development.
urban.overview: A phased urban block that combines offices, residences, retail, and public spaces in a transit-accessible district.

urban.title: Smart Mobility Hub
urban.summary: Intermodal center with EV charging, parking, and digital wayfinding.
urban.overview: A mobility-focused asset that improves transit efficiency while unlocking adjacent commercial value.

ict.title: Tier-III Data Center Campus
ict.overview: A resilient data infrastructure asset designed to meet enterprise, cloud, and regional disaster-recovery demand.

ict.title: Regional Technology Park
ict.summary: Plug-and-play facilities for BPO, software, and innovation labs.
ict.overview: A multi-tenant technology zone for digital services, startup incubation, and advanced capability centers.

education.title: International Knowledge City
education.summary: Integrated higher education district with student living, labs, and innovation spaces.
education.overview: A large-scale knowledge ecosystem bringing together universities, R&D facilities, student services, and private-sector collaboration hubs.

education.title: Technical Institute Development
education.summary: Industry-aligned vocational campus for high-demand technical disciplines.
education.overview: A competency-based training center linked with employers in manufacturing, ICT, and engineering services.

transport.title: Inland Logistics Zone
transport.summary: Warehousing, cold storage, and customs-enabled distribution hub.
transport.overview: A strategic inland logistics complex supporting multimodal cargo consolidation and efficient trade movement.

transport.title: Rail Freight Terminal Modernization
transport.summary: Container handling and scheduling upgrades for faster freight throughput.
transport.overview: Terminal modernization project designed to improve turnaround times and cargo reliability for trade operators.

aviation.title: Aircraft MRO Facility Upgrade
aviation.summary: Expansion of maintenance, repair, and overhaul capacity for regional fleets.
aviation.overview: A technical services platform to capture regional MRO demand and improve turnaround capacity for airline operators.

aviation.title: Air Cargo Digital Terminal
aviation.summary: Digitized terminal systems with integrated cold-chain handling.
aviation.overview: A cargo modernization project focused on visibility, compliance automation, and faster perishable goods movement.
financialSnapshot: Revenue model: cargo handling + digital fees

manufacturing.title: Light Engineering Cluster
manufacturing.summary: Shared tooling, prototyping, and quality labs for engineering SMEs.
manufacturing.overview: A cluster-based industrial platform that improves productivity and export capability for precision engineering firms.
financialSnapshot: Revenue model: lease + shared service fees

manufacturing.title: Sustainable Packaging Industrial Park
manufacturing.overview: An industrial park designed for sustainable packaging manufacturing with integrated utilities and export facilitation.

renewable.title: Solar Park Development
renewable.summary: Utility-scale solar generation with grid tie-in and balancing systems.
renewable.overview: A large-scale solar development designed for dependable generation and long-term power offtake potential.

renewable.title: Onshore Wind Farm Expansion
renewable.summary: Wind installation and transmission support infrastructure.
renewable.overview: A grid-connected wind expansion project targeting stable generation profiles and scalable phase-wise deployment.
